title: 06/01/21 DPS Hour 1 Chris Mannix
itunes:title: 06/01/21 DPS Hour 1 Chris Mannix
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, reaction to the ongoing NBA playoffs--mounting star player injuries, worsening fan behavior in arenas and impending doom for certain NBA teams. Also, Chris Mannix--senior NBA writer for Sports Illustrated--shares his playoffs observations with Dan.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
